snippet.title: SILK - A Leo Parker Adventure-Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A new Leo Parker adventure from the creators of SAND!


1917. Warlords fight for control over China. Leo Parker is teaching at the University of Oxford when he receives a letter from his friend and Mentor, Sir Francis. He is in danger, and needs Leo’s help. Leo must travel to China and unravel the mystery Sir Francis has become entangled in.


Silk is part puzzle game, part adventure, part graphic novel. Search Sir Francis’ home for clues, meet diverse characters, retrace Sir Francis’ steps and locate the ancient palace of a long dead Ming empress. Silk is by far our biggest adventure yet!


* Beautiful hand-drawn artwork.

* A rich story that unfolds over the course of the game.

* Over 50 challenging puzzles.

* A detailed hint system to nudge you in the right direction.

* Each puzzle has an easier mode for if you get really stuck.

* Intuitive inventory system.

* Optimised for the latest devices.

* A unique alternate-history story.

* Try the first level of Leo’s latest adventure for free!


Perfect for fans of adventure, point-and-click and Myst-like games as well as those entirely new to the genre, Silk is a must-buy!
